org.angiedev.schoolfinder.dao

Interface SchoolDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateSchoolDAO

    public interface SchoolDAO
    SchoolDAO is an interface which defines the data access operations to find, create and update schools.
    Author:
    Angela Gordon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteSchool(School school)
      Deletes the passed in school from the database.
      School getSchool(long schoolId)
      Retrieves a school based on the passed in id.
      School getSchoolByNcesId(java.lang.String ncesId)
      Retrieves a school based on the passed in nces id.
      java.util.List<School> getSchoolsByDistrictId(long districtId)
      Retrieves the list of schools belonging to the passed in district.
      java.util.List<School> getSchoolsByStateWithNoGeoData(java.lang.String stateCode)
      Retrieves the list of schools within the passed in state that do not have geo location data (latitude and longitude fields).
      java.util.List<School> getSchoolsNearGeoLocation(double latitude, double longitude, int searchRadius)
      Retrieves the list of schools that are located within a specified radius of a the passed in latitude and longitude geo location.
      void insertSchool(School school)
      Inserts a new school into the database.
      void updateSchool(School school)
      Updates a school with the passed in school's object data.

    • Method Detail

      • insertSchool

        void insertSchool(School school)
        Inserts a new school into the database.
        Parameters:
        school - the school being added to the database.

      • getSchool

        School getSchool(long schoolId)
        Retrieves a school based on the passed in id.
        Parameters:
        schoolId - the id uniquely identifying the school in the database (PK).
        Returns:
        the school if found, otherwise null.

      • getSchoolByNcesId

        School getSchoolByNcesId(java.lang.String ncesId)
        Retrieves a school based on the passed in nces id.
        Parameters:
        ncesId - the nces id for the school (id assigned by the National Center for Education Statistics).
        Returns:
        the school if found, otherwise null.

      • updateSchool

        void updateSchool(School school)
        Updates a school with the passed in school's object data.
        Parameters:
        school - school object containing new data that needs to be updated in database.

      • deleteSchool

        void deleteSchool(School school)
        Deletes the passed in school from the database.
        Parameters:
        school - school being deleted.

      • getSchoolsByDistrictId

        java.util.List<School> getSchoolsByDistrictId(long districtId)
        Retrieves the list of schools belonging to the passed in district.
        Parameters:
        districtId - unique id of the district.
        Returns:
        list of schools belonging to the district.

      • getSchoolsByStateWithNoGeoData

        java.util.List<School> getSchoolsByStateWithNoGeoData(java.lang.String stateCode)
        Retrieves the list of schools within the passed in state that do not have geo location data (latitude and longitude fields).
        Parameters:
        stateCode - 2 letter state code.
        Returns:
        list of schools belonging to passed in state that do not have geolocation data.

      • getSchoolsNearGeoLocation

        java.util.List<School> getSchoolsNearGeoLocation(double latitude,
                                                 double longitude,
                                                 int searchRadius)
        Retrieves the list of schools that are located within a specified radius of a the passed in latitude and longitude geo location.
        Parameters:
        latitude - latitude of the position to search near.
        longitude - longitude of the position to search near.
        searchRadius - the search radius in miles to conduct the search.
        Returns:
        the list of schools within the specified radius of the passed in geo location.
